pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, June 24, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, June 24, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Villeray.   

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m. and gather at the corner of Castelneau Street and Drolet Street
